ROW.NAME: 用电量与税收收入分析

ROW.DATDSC: select id,round(eleqty/10000) bys,round(sy/10000) sy,round(sntq/10000) sntq,hb,tb from ( select m.id,bys.eleqty,bys.sy,'' hb,sn.sntq,'' tb from v_mm m,( --本月数 select substr(a.yymm,6,7) mm,nvl(sum(eleqty),0) eleqty,0 sy from tax_eledata a,tax_company b,tax_compclass d,tax_cmpammno e where a.usrid=e.ammno and b.id=e.cmid and b.typclsid=d.id and nvl(b.typclsid,' ') like '%' and b.hymx_dm in (select hy_dm from dm_gy_hy start with hy_dm in ('B','C','D') connect by prior hy_dm=sjhy_dm ) and substr(a.yymm,0,4)=NVL('[%YYYY]',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')) group by a.yymm ) bys,( --上年同期数 select substr(a.yymm,6,7) mm,0 eleqty,nvl(sum(eleqty),0) sntq from tax_eledata a,tax_company b,tax_compclass d,tax_cmpammno e where a.usrid=e.ammno and b.id=e.cmid and b.typclsid=d.id and nvl(b.typclsid,' ') like '%' and b.hymx_dm in (select hy_dm from dm_gy_hy start with hy_dm in ('B','C','D') connect by prior hy_dm=sjhy_dm ) and to_char(to_number(substr(a.yymm,0,4))+1)=NVL('[%YYYY]',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')) group by a.yymm ) sn where m.id=bys.mm(+) and m.id=sn.mm(+) --and m.id<=to_char(sysdate,'mm') order by m.id )

select round(bys.taxmny/10000,4) 本月增值税,0 上月增值税, round(sn.sntqmny/10000,4) 上年同期,'' 环比,'' 同比 from v_mm m,( select substr(a.yymm,-2) mm,nvl(sum(taxmny),0) taxmny,0 lastmny, 0 sntqmny from tax_taxdata a,v_tax_company b,tax_compclass d where a.id=b.id(+) and b.typclsid=d.id(+) --and nvl(b.typclsid,' ') like '[%HY]%' and substr(a.yymm,0,4)= NVL('[%YYYY]',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')) group by substr(a.yymm,-2) ) bys,( select substr(a.yymm,-2) mm,0 elemny,nvl(sum(taxmny),0) sntqmny from tax_taxdata a,v_tax_company b,tax_compclass d where a.id=b.id(+) and b.typclsid=d.id(+) --and nvl(b.typclsid,' ') like '[%HY]%' and to_char(to_number(substr(a.yymm,0,4))+1)=NVL('[%YYYY]',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')) group by substr(a.yymm,-2)
) sn where m.id=bys.mm(+) and m.id=sn.mm(+) order by m.id
